attributes.action: re-open the no.10 downing street email system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as a person who would like to contact the pm and other likes me about policy and my personal situation i would like the return of the email system which you have said is coming but not put up as yet.

please can you give ppl on this website and the communications section, that you will have the emails system up on a certain date.

this g20 or the budget would be good start for the email system.

rejection.details: Hi Salman, Thanks for your petition. The return of the email system for Number 10 is imminent. Please check the contacts page shortly for an update.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
